key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including compliance with ADA and federal regulations
Interest rate sensitivity and exposure to variable-rate loans
Economic and sector-specific risks tied to New Jersey and New York markets
Competitive pressures from traditional banks and fintech firms
Merger and acquisition risks, particularly the proposed merger with The First of Long Island Corporation
controversies: Investigation into the fairness of the proposed merger with The First of Long Island Corporation
Customer complaints about unresolved issues and poor customer service
social_issues: Customer service issues impacting customer retention and brand reputation
governance_issues: Execution risks in digital transformation and expansion strategies
